title: What is the best female K-pop group for a dark concept? - Quora

response.answer_text: My head immediately thinks of Dreamcatcher. “Dreamcatcher (드림캐쳐) consists of 7 members: JiU, SuA, Siyeon, Handong, Yoohyeon, Dami, and Gahyeon. Each member represents a nightmare or fear. The group debuted on January 13, 2017, under Happy Face Entertainment. They are currently under Dreamcatcher Company.” - Kprofiles    they pull off the dark concept so well don’t they? absolutely gorgeous. Another group with a dark concept that is (usually) presented as colourful and sweet is Red Velvet.  Peekaboo!  Psycho  Russian Roulette OTHER GROUPS (honourable mentions) (G)I-DLE “Oh My God”   This song was pulled off VERY well, it’s a difficult concept but I loved the music video and concept. LOONA (Olivia Hye ft JinSoul) “Egoist”   What can’t LOONA do?
